attributes.action: Allow goods vehicles to use bus lanes and help with congestion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Goods vehicles need to get a job done, So let them use bus lanes It will also help with congestion as vans etc are using a lane that is not full of traffic and taffic will flow smoother, This is done in camberley and probably other places and works very well and allows goods vehicles to get on with there deliveries and not be stuck in traffic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
